page.description: The A5.READ_SETTING() method is a simplified version of the A5.LOAD_SETTINGS() method that reads a single value (called Setting_Name ) from the current database's library.

argument.name: name
argument.description: The name of the library variable that you wish to retrieve.

section.title: Example
section.example: MyName = "Fred" A5.write_setting("Name", myname) Current_name = a5.read_setting("Name") current_name -> "Fred"
